titleStmt.title: The history of the English and Scotch presbytery wherein is discovered their designs and practices for the subversion of government in church and state / written in French, by an eminent divine of the Reformed church, and now Englished.
Historie des nouveaux presbytériens anglois et escossois. English
titleStmt.author: Basier, Isaac, 1607-1676.

titleStmt.title: The history of the English and Scotch presbytery wherein is discovered their designs and practices for the subversion of government in church and state / written in French, by an eminent divine of the Reformed church, and now Englished.
Historie des nouveaux presbytériens anglois et escossois. English
titleStmt.author: Basier, Isaac, 1607-1676.
Du Moulin, Peter, 1601-1684.
Bramhall, John, 1594-1663.
Playford, Matthew.

editionStmt.edition: The second edition, corrected and enlarged.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Isaac Basier. Cf. DNB and Bibliothèque nat. cat.
Also attributed to Pierre Du Moulin and John Bramhall. Cf. Halkett & Laing; Wing also attributes to Du Moulin.
Translated by Matthew Playford. Cf. Halkett & Laing.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
